targets.query: SELECT mean(from_pw) - mean(to_pw) FROM autogen.http WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) tz('$tz')
SELECT mean(from_grid) - mean(to_grid) FROM autogen.http WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) tz('$tz')

SELECT  (1+from_solar/abs(from_solar))*from_solar/2  FROM (SELECT integral(solar)/1000/3600 - integral(to_pw)/1000/3600 - integral(to_grid)/1000/3600  AS from_solar FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT fp FROM (SELECT sum("from_pw")  * $avg_per_kwh AS fp FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT s - (tp + tg) FROM (SELECT sum("solar") * $avg_per_kwh AS s,  sum("to_pw")  * $avg_per_kwh AS tp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_per_kwh AS tg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))
SELECT tg FROM (SELECT sum("to_pw")  * $avg_per_kwh AS tp, sum("solar") * $avg_per_kwh AS s, sum("to_grid") * $avg_per_kwh AS tg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))

SELECT tg + (s - tp - tg ) + fp FROM (SELECT sum("to_pw")  * $avg_per_kwh AS tp, sum("solar") * $avg_per_kwh AS s, sum("to_grid") * $avg_per_kwh AS tg, sum("from_pw") * $avg_per_kwh AS fp FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter tz('$tz'))

patterns.name: Grid
patterns.transform_values:
Exporting
_value_
| Idle | Importing
_value_

patterns.name: Battery
patterns.transform_values:
Charging
_value_
| Idle | Discharging
_value_

targets.query: SELECT last("battery_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Powerwall", last("solar_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Solar", last("load_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Home", last("site_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Grid" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 1m
